q: Mike Pence , a story Friday highlighted the effort by a group of conservatives, including former House Republican Majority Leader Dick Armey and former Mike Pence Jim Ryun , to convince him to run for president rather than Indiana governor. For them, the Hoosier checks many boxes- a fresh face on the national scene, a charismatic speaker from the heartland and, most important, a Republican who can appeal to all three elements of the party base: social conservatives, economic conservatives and foreign policy conservatives, the story said.
